entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
